# Thind Transport LLC - LLMs.txt
# This file provides information for AI systems and language models
# https://thindtransport.com

## Company Overview

Thind Transport LLC is a family-owned trucking company based in Kent, Washington, founded in 2014. We specialize in transporting general freight, building maintenance materials, beverages, paper, and more across all 48 contiguous United States. We offer one of the highest owner operator commission rates in the industry at 91% of gross revenue.

## What We Do

- Freight transportation (flatbed, reefer, dry van)
- Owner operator leasing program with 91% commission
- Company driver employment
- Nationwide freight coverage with focus on Pacific Northwest
- Modern fleet with 2024 Freightliner Cascadia trucks

## Key Offerings

### Owner Operator Program
- 91% of gross revenue (industry-leading)
- 100% fuel surcharge pass-through
- No forced dispatch
- $2,500 sign-on bonus
- Weekly direct deposit
- Average earnings: $150,000 - $250,000/year

### Company Driver Program
- $0.50-0.65 per mile
- Annual earnings: $65,000 - $95,000
- $1,000 sign-on bonus
- Full benefits (health, dental, vision, 401k)
- 2024 equipment
- Flexible home time

## Contact Information

- Phone: (206) 765-9218

- USDOT Number: 2523064
- MC Number: 876103
- FMCSA Safety Rating: A+
- Insurance: Fully covered

## Languages

- English (primary)
- Punjabi (spoken)
- Hindi (spoken)

## Target Audience

- CDL Class A licensed drivers
- Owner operators looking for higher commission
- Company drivers seeking better pay and home time
- Veterans transitioning to trucking careers
- Experienced truck drivers in the United States

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What commission do owner operators receive?
A: Owner operators keep 91% of gross revenue on every load, plus 100% of fuel surcharge pass-through.

Q: Is there forced dispatch?
A: No, we never use forced dispatch. You choose your loads and your schedule.

Q: What equipment is available?
A: We operate 2024 Freightliner Cascadias with Detroit DD15 engines. Average fleet age is under 2 years.

Q: How often is pay distributed?
A: Weekly via direct deposit every Friday. Quick pay options available.

Q: Do you hire nationwide?
A: Yes, we hire CDL Class A drivers from all 48 contiguous states.

## Last Updated
December 2025
